moves.2. h3 Nf6 3. Nc3 e6: I enjoy this opening.  I am often successful with it.
moves.4. a3: I think it is not frequently used and is difficult to attack.
moves.4... Be7 5. e3 O-O: Mainly because of the quick and efficient opportunity to castle.
moves.8. Bb5 c6 9. Ba4 b5 10. Bb3: His pawn structure is depressingly miserable. (yawn)
moves.21. Qc1 Nc6 22. Ra1: He loses a lot of time doing God knows what with his rook.
moves.22... g5 23. Ra2 a5 24. Qd2: More lost time with his queen.
moves.26... f4 27. Qb5: Had I not had superior position on the board my next move could've cost me the game. I was unaware that my queen was undefended.
moves.27... fxe3 28. Qxc5: Ouch.  However, my lead pawn is ready to make white very uncomfortable.
